text: Giulio Maceratini (13 February 1938 â€“ 25 July 2020) was an Italian politician. He was born in Rome. He was a member of the European Parliament between 6 June 1988 to 1 October 1988. Maceratini died on 25 July 2020 in Rome at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Giulio Maceratini
